Welcome NeoAndroid! Your Public Address Your Private Key (WIF) Never lose or share your private key with anyone, doing so will comprimise the security of your funds. START Your private key is the most important piece of information in the NEO Economy.\n\n We will save an encrypted version on your device, but please make sure to write down the private key in another secure location so that you may retrieve your funds in case something happens to your device. I confirm that I have backed up my private key in another secure location

GET STARTED
Your Cold Storage Private Key (WIF) Your cold storage private key will never be stored on this device. Instead it will be encrypted into two seperate fragments. You will need both pieces in order to withdraw from cold storage. This is made possible from some math magic called "Shamir's Secret Sharing Algorithm." Scan Read More Encrypt Into Key Fragments Scan the private key of cold storage Encryption in Progress... Two pieces of encrypted data is generated. One is securely stored on your device and You will be given another one in the next screen. Continue First Fragment Stored on Device
Second Key Fragment Save You can choose to print this or email it to yourself. You will scan this QR code with your O3 wallet inorder to topup from your cold storage account. Anyone who gets a hold of this data alone is not able to do anything with your NEO. Done I have saved this QR Code Withdraw Cold Storage Vault Remove Cold Storage
O3 Simple Transfer
Security
Convenience
Introducing
O3 Simple Transfer
O3 Simple Transfer
Secure and Convenient way to transfer NEO or GAS from any one of your NEO addresses to O3 Mobile Wallet.
Two pieces of information will be genereated from your private key. One part is securely stored on this device. Another part you can choose to store it anywhere.
Simply scan the given QR code and enter NEO or GAS amount you would like to transfer to your O3 Wallet. Youâ€™re all set!
